members.name: focus
members.descriptionHtml: Sets focus to the text field

members.name: reset
members.descriptionHtml: Reset the state of the picker to the default

members.name: allFocusable
members.descriptionHtml: Allows all elements to be focused, including disabled ones

members.name: allowTextInput
members.descriptionHtml: Whether the DatePicker allows input a date string directly or not

members.name: ariaLabel
members.descriptionHtml: Aria Label for TextField of the DatePicker for screen reader users.

members.name: borderless
members.descriptionHtml: Determines if DatePicker has a border.

members.name: calendarAs
members.descriptionHtml: Custom Calendar to be used for date picking

members.name: calendarProps
members.descriptionHtml: Pass calendar props to calendar component

members.name: calloutProps
members.descriptionHtml: Pass callout props to callout component

members.name: className
members.descriptionHtml: Optional Classname for datepicker root element .

members.name: componentRef
members.descriptionHtml: Optional callback to access the IDatePicker interface. Use this instead of ref for accessing the public methods and properties of the component.

members.name: dateTimeFormatter
members.descriptionHtml: Apply additional formating to dates, for example localized date formatting.

members.name: disableAutoFocus
members.descriptionHtml: Whether the DatePicker should open automatically when the control is focused

members.name: disabled
members.descriptionHtml: Disabled state of the DatePicker.

members.name: firstDayOfWeek
members.descriptionHtml: The first day of the week for your locale.

members.name: firstWeekOfYear
members.descriptionHtml: Defines when the first week of the year should start, FirstWeekOfYear.FirstDay, FirstWeekOfYear.FirstFullWeek or FirstWeekOfYear.FirstFourDayWeek are the possible values

members.name: formatDate
members.descriptionHtml: Optional method to format the chosen date to a string to display in the DatePicker

members.name: highlightCurrentMonth
members.descriptionHtml: Whether the month picker should highlight the current month

members.name: highlightSelectedMonth
members.descriptionHtml: Whether the month picker should highlight the selected month

members.name: initialPickerDate
members.descriptionHtml: The initially highlighted date in the calendar picker

members.name: isMonthPickerVisible
members.descriptionHtml: Whether the month picker is shown beside the day picker or hidden.

members.name: isRequired
members.descriptionHtml: Whether the DatePicker is a required field or not

members.name: label
members.descriptionHtml: Label for the DatePicker

members.name: maxDate
members.descriptionHtml: The maximum allowable date.

members.name: minDate
members.descriptionHtml: The minimum allowable date.

members.name: onAfterMenuDismiss
members.descriptionHtml: Callback that runs after DatePicker's menu (Calendar) is closed

members.name: onSelectDate
members.descriptionHtml: Callback issued when a date is selected

members.name: parseDateFromString
members.descriptionHtml: Optional method to parse the text input value to date, it is only useful when allowTextInput is set to true

members.name: pickerAriaLabel
members.descriptionHtml: Aria label for date picker popup for screen reader users.

members.name: placeholder
members.descriptionHtml: Placeholder text for the DatePicker

members.name: showCloseButton
members.descriptionHtml: Whether the CalendarDay close button should be shown or not.

members.name: showGoToToday
members.descriptionHtml: Whether the "Go to today" link should be shown or not

members.name: showMonthPickerAsOverlay
members.descriptionHtml: Show month picker on top of date picker when visible.

members.name: showWeekNumbers
members.descriptionHtml: Whether the calendar should show the week number (weeks 1 to 53) before each week row

members.name: strings
members.descriptionHtml: Localized strings to use in the DatePicker

members.name: styles
members.descriptionHtml: Call to provide customized styling that will layer on top of the variant rules.

members.name: tabIndex
members.descriptionHtml: The tabIndex of the TextField

members.name: textField
members.descriptionHtml: Pass textField props to textField component. Prop name is "textField" for compatiblity with upcoming slots work.

members.name: theme
members.descriptionHtml: Theme provided by High-Order Component.

members.name: today
members.descriptionHtml: Value of today. If null, current time in client machine will be used.

members.name: underlined
members.descriptionHtml: Whether or not the Textfield of the DatePicker is underlined.

members.name: value
members.descriptionHtml: Default value of the DatePicker, if any

members.name: closeButtonAriaLabel
members.descriptionHtml: Aria-label for the "close" button.

members.name: days
members.descriptionHtml: An array of strings for the full names of days of the week. The array is 0-based, so days[0] should be the full name of Sunday.

members.name: goToToday
members.descriptionHtml: String to render for button to direct the user to today's date.

members.name: invalidInputErrorMessage
members.descriptionHtml: Error message to render for TextField if input date string parsing fails.

members.name: isOutOfBoundsErrorMessage
members.descriptionHtml: Error message to render for TextField if date boundary (minDate, maxDate) validation fails.

members.name: isRequiredErrorMessage
members.descriptionHtml: Error message to render for TextField if isRequired validation fails.

members.name: months
members.descriptionHtml: An array of strings for the full names of months. The array is 0-based, so months[0] should be the full name of January.

members.name: nextMonthAriaLabel
members.descriptionHtml: Aria-label for the "next month" button.

members.name: nextYearAriaLabel
members.descriptionHtml: Aria-label for the "next year" button.

members.name: prevMonthAriaLabel
members.descriptionHtml: Aria-label for the "previous month" button.

members.name: prevYearAriaLabel
members.descriptionHtml: Aria-label for the "previous year" button.

members.name: shortDays
members.descriptionHtml: An array of strings for the initials of the days of the week. The array is 0-based, so days[0] should be the initial of Sunday.

members.name: shortMonths
members.descriptionHtml: An array of strings for the short names of months. The array is 0-based, so shortMonths[0] should be the short name of January.

members.name: className
members.descriptionHtml: Accept custom classNames

members.name: theme
members.descriptionHtml: Theme provided by High-Order Component.

members.name: root
members.descriptionHtml: Style for the root element.
